title: California National Historic Trail: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for ways to get involved? Browse the links below to find opportunities:   NPS Centennial - Celebrate the 100th birthday of the National Park Service! Join us with activities, events, and programs across the nation.   Partners - Check out how we partner with tribes, organizations, agencies, and individuals to manage the trail and provide excellent experiences for visitors.   Work With Us - Find out what paid or volunteer opportunities currently exist.   Planning - Stay up to date and get involved in the planning process.    Support Your Park - Discover ways that you can be an active part of sharing and preserving the legacy of the trail.
